org.stuntaz.libqcw.blobs.barchart
Class BasicLineBlob

java.lang.Object
  org.stuntaz.libqcw.blobs.QRecord
      org.stuntaz.libqcw.blobs.barchart.BasicLineBlob
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBlob
public final class BasicLineBlob
extends QRecord

Represents a basic line drawn on a bar chart. This line may be a segment, ray, extended line, or note.
